paragraph.heading: 2Compiling

list.item: Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to \compiler\examples\(.net version)\vision2\standard_dialogs\ and select standard_dialogs.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.

paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. If you select an item from the "Standard Dialog" menu, a dialog of that type will be displayed. Selecting "Exit" from the "File" menu will exit the application.
